content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I. GENERAL PROVISIONS\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this Schedule of procedures for suspension from work on the grounds of being under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances (hereinafter – the Schedule) shall be to define the procedures of the suspension from work of the employee who is under the influence of alcohol or narcotic or toxic substances at work.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Employees of the Company shall not be allowed:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.1. to show up at the workplace being under the influence of alcohol or narcotic and toxic substances; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.2. to bring alcoholic beverages, narcotic or toxic substances to the territory and premises of the Company; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.3. to consume alcoholic beverages or narcotic and toxic substances at the workplace during and after work.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. An employee, who notices that another employee is under the influence of alcohol, must immediately inform the line manager and, if necessary, take measures to prevent a potential mishap.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. The presence of an employee under the influence of alcohol or narcotic, psychotropic or other psychoactive substances at the workplace, in the premises or territory of legal entities during or after work, and the employee’s avoidance to take a sobriety test shall incur a fine on the employee from thirty to two hundred and ninety euro (Article 98(1) of the Code of Administrative Offences of the Republic of Lithuania).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. The failure to suspend from work the employee who is under the influence of alcohol or narcotic, psychotropic or other psychoactive substances shall incur a fine on employers or other responsible persons from five hundred and fifty to one thousand and five hundred euro (Article 98(2) of the Code of Administrative Offences of the Republic of Lithuania).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II. PROCEDURE AND DOCUMENTATION OF THE SUSPENSION FROM WORK ON THE GROUNDS OF BEING UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL OR PSYCHOACTIVE SUBSTANCES \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. An employee of the Company, who shows up at work being under the influence of alcohol, narcotic, psychotropic or toxic substances, shall not be allowed to work on that day (shift) and shall not be remunerated for that period (Article 49(1) of the Labour Code of the Republic of Lithuania).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. Before initiating the procedure of the suspension from work on the grounds of being under the influence of alcohol and/or narcotic or toxic substances (hereinafter – psychoactive substances), the following must be assessed:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1. indications suggesting that the person is under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1.1. smell of alcohol coming from the mouth;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1.2. inadequate behaviour (agitated, irritable, aggressive, sluggish, etc.);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1.3. slurred speech;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1.4. uncoordinated movements, unstable posture;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.1.5. other indications.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.2. readings of technical devices (breathalyzers, etc.) used to measure the level of alcohol or psychoactive substances (hereinafter - technical devices); \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.3. whether the employee is potentially under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.3.1. at the workplace where he must perform his job duties;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.3.2. during work (when he must perform his job duties or observe the order established in the workplace);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.3.3. because the intoxication was caused by manufacturing processes taking place in the Company or by other effects of factors of the working environment which do not depend on the employee.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7. Having assessed the circumstances referred to in paragraph 6 of this Schedule and when it can be reasonably suspected that the employee is under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances, the Report on suspension from work on the grounds of being under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances (Annex 1) shall be drawn up without undue delay (hereinafter - the Suspension Report).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8. The Suspension Report shall be drawn up and signed by the manager of the company, institution or organisation (hereinafter - the company) or another person authorised by the employer, in the presence of at least two employees of the company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9. The Suspension Report (Annex 1) shall include the following:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.1. the grounds (such as an official notice or other information) which gave rise to the suspicion that the employee was under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.2. the indications which are referred to in subparagraph 6.1 of this Schedule and allow suspecting that the employee is under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10. The suspended employee shall be required, on written instruction of the manager of the company or other person authorised by the employer, to provide an immediate written explanation regarding the suspicions brought against the employee (Annex 3). The fact that the employee has been instructed in writing to provide written explanation of the suspicions brought against him, and the fact that he provided or failed to provide such explanation, shall be indicated accordingly in the Suspension Report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11. After reading the Suspension Report, the suspended employee shall be asked to sign it indicating whether he agrees or disagrees with his suspension on the grounds of being under the influence of alcoholic beverages or psychoactive substances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12. The refusal of the suspended employee to read and sign the Suspension Report shall be noted in the Suspension Report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13. If the employee does not agree with the suspension (by noting this in the Suspension Report or by refusing to sign the Suspension Report), or does not provide an explanation for the suspicions brought against him that he is under the influence of alcohol or other psychoactive substances, the manager of the company or another person authorised by the employer shall immediately draw up a Referral for the assessment of the person's intoxication with alcohol or psychoactive substances (Annex 2) (hereinafter the Referral), give it to the employee and take the employee suspected of being under the influence alcohol or psychoactive substances to a personal health care institution for a medical examination. A copy of the referral shall be retained in the company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Referral (Annex 2) shall include the following:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.1. the name and address of the personal health care institution to which the employee is referred for a medical examination;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.2. the name and title of the representative of the employer or other authorised person of the employer delivering the employee to the personal health care institution, as well as the name, address and code of the workplace;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.3. the full name and date of birth of the employee being referred;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.4. the reasons for the referral;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.5. the date and exact time (hours and minutes) of the employee's arrival at the personal health care institution).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.6. the time the referral was drawn up;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.7. the employer’s commitment to reimburse the cost of the medical examination in accordance with the invoice issued by the personal health care institution.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15. The Referral for the assessment of the person’s intoxication with alcohol or psychoactive substances shall be made and the suspended employee shall be brought to the personal health care institution (the suspended employee shall be required to arrive personally, see paragraph 18) within 1 hour from the time of the drawing up of the Suspension Report or within the time period to be determined by the employer in the individual case, taking into account the distance to the personal health care institution and any other relevant circumstances influencing the expeditious performance of the medical examination.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16. The delivery of a suspended employee for a medical examination to a personal health care institution by the employer’s transport shall be arranged by the manager of the company or another person authorised by the employer. The suspended employee shall be accompanied to the personal health care institution by a person authorised by the employer.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17. The Referral shall be submitted to the medical specialist of the personal health care institution who will carry out the medical examination of the suspended employee. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18. If the suspended employee refuses to undergo a medical examination, this shall be noted in the Suspension Report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III. REFERRAL OF THE SUSPENDED EMPLOYEE FOR MEDICAL EXAMINATION\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19. If the suspended employee refuses to use the company’s means of transport, upon the agreement of the company’s manager or other person authorised by the employer, he shall be asked to visit a personal health care institution within the time limit specified in paragraph 12 of this Schedule. The employee’s refusal to use the company's transport and the employer’s agreement that the employee should go to the health care institution by himself shall be confirmed by signatures of both the employee and the employer in the Suspension Report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20. If the conclusion in the medical examination report of the personal health care institution confirms that the suspended employee was under the influence of psychoactive substances, the costs of the medical examination shall be borne by the suspended employee in accordance with the procedure laid down in Chapter X of the Labour Code of the Republic of Lithuania.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21. It shall be explained to the suspended employee that, not later than 1 hour after performance of the medical examination or refusal to undergo it, the suspended employee shall have the right to visit a preferred personal health care institution and undergo there a medical examination at his own expense if he refuses to undergo the medical examination carried out by the employer’s personal health care professionals or by the professionals of the health care institution indicated in the Referral, or disagrees with the results of such examination.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. FINAL PROVISIONS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22. A written instruction from the manager of the company or other person authorised by the employer to the employee to provide an explanation for the suspicion that he is under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances, the written explanation from the employee for the suspicion brought against him, a Suspension Report and conclusions of the medical examination report from the personal healthcare institution shall be forwarded to the employer’s representative or another authorised person who takes a decision on the infringement of the job duties.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"23. If the suspended employee refuses to sign the Suspension Report, the Referral or refuses to go to a personal health care institution for a medical examination, the employer reserves the right to rely on explanations of other employees, testimonies of witnesses, written evidence and other means specified in Article 177 of the Code of Civil Procedure the Republic of Lithuania to prove the fact of the employee’s intoxication.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"24. A report submitted by medical or police institutions regarding the fact of the employee being under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances identified at work in accordance with the Code of Civil Procedure of the Republic of Lithuania shall be considered as written evidence on the basis of which an employee’s Suspension Report may be drawn up and the procedures for termination of the employment contract on the employer’s initiative due to a serious violation of job duties may be initiated, as provided for in Article 58 of the Labour Code of the Republic of Lithuania.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"25. If the employee is suspended on the grounds of being under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances, this Schedule and the Scheme for the suspension from work of employees who are under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances (Annex 4) shall apply.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annexes to schedule of procedures for suspension from work on the grounds of being under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annex 1 \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Report of suspension from work on the grounds of being under the influence of alcohol or psychoactive substances:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":20856,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e8859137-9a74-4530-bd14-54e0e47b0d37/Annex 1.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e8859137-9a74-4530-bd14-54e0e47b0d37/Annex 1.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Annex 1.docx\",\"name\":\"Annex 1.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"e8859137-9a74-4530-bd14-54e0e47b0d37\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annex 2\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Referral for assessment of the person’s intoxication with alcohol or psychoactive substances \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":18659,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/298aafd3-4669-409b-b1b5-f9d624c63aa8/Annex 2.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/298aafd3-4669-409b-b1b5-f9d624c63aa8/Annex 2.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Annex 2.docx\",\"name\":\"Annex 2.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"298aafd3-4669-409b-b1b5-f9d624c63aa8\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annex 3\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request for explanation regarding violation of job duties\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":17477,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/329849d2-d800-42d2-909c-411cf9bc5632/Annex 3.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/329849d2-d800-42d2-909c-411cf9bc5632/Annex 3.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Annex 3.docx\",\"name\":\"Annex 3.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"329849d2-d800-42d2-909c-411cf9bc5632\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annex 4\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Scheme for suspension of employees who are under the influence of alcohol and psychoactive substances from work\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":50299,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ec4dca8b-104e-4185-b974-a1623ab4ed81/Annex 4.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ec4dca8b-104e-4185-b974-a1623ab4ed81/Annex 4.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Annex 4.docx\",\"name\":\"Annex 4.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"ec4dca8b-104e-4185-b974-a1623ab4ed81\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
